REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f2520 reute r f BC-MINNESOTA-POWER-<MPL> 03-25 0079

TEXT.TITLE: MINNESOTA POWER <MPL> SELLS SEVEN-YEAR BONDS
TEXT.BODY: Minnesota Power and Light Co is raising 55 mln dlrs through an offering of first and refunding mortgage bonds due 1994 with a 7-3/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said sole manager PaineWebber Inc. That is 68 basis points more than the yield of comparable Treasury securities. Non-callable for five years, the issue is rated A-2 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and A-plus by Standard and Poor's Corp. Reuter
